action.action-desc: Mr. Crawford (for himself and Mr. Graves) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Water Resources Reform and Development Act of 2014 with respect to the application of the Spill Prevention, Control, and Countermeasure rule to certain farms, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Farmers Undertake Environmental Land Stewardship Act or the FUELS Act.

section.header: Applicability of Spill Prevention, Control, and Countermeasure rule
section.text: Section 1049 of the Water Resources Reform and Development Act of 2014 (33 U.S.C. 1361 note) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1)(B), by striking 20,000 and inserting 42,000;
by amending paragraph (2)(A) to read as follows:
an aggregate aboveground storage capacity greater than 10,000 gallons but less than 42,000 gallons; and

clause.text: by amending subparagraph (A) to read as follows:

subparagraph.text: with an aggregate aboveground storage capacity of less than or equal to 10,000 gallons; and

clause.text: in subparagraph (B), by striking ; and and inserting a period; and

subparagraph.text: in clause (i), by striking 1,000 and inserting 1,320; and
in clause (ii), by striking 2,500 and inserting 3,000; and
